links.*: The Road to Isengard (The War of the Ring)

wikitext.*:
'''Mugworth''' was the name of a village in [[Southfarthing]], mentioned in a draft version of the  eighth chapter of '''''[[The Two Towers]]''''', ''[[The Road to Isengard]]''.

It was said to be the home of a [[Hobbits|hobbit]] called [[Tobold Hornblower#Other versions of the legendarium|Elias Tobiasson]], who introduced [[Pipe-weed]] to [[The Shire]].<ref>{{WR|1|III}}, p. 36</ref>
